name: Candy's Dream Egg [LD46]
description:
Join the adventure with Candy and her mysterious egg friend in this cute retro puzzle-platformer! A strange dream world full of head-scratching puzzles and deadly challenges awaits you :)

Note: Windows only, sorry!

[ KEYBOARD CONTROLS ]

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Jump

X - Grab Egg / Throw Egg

Hold X - Aim Throw

Hold Up - Call Egg

Down + Throw - Bounce on Egg

R - Restart

Space - Pause

[ GAMEPAD CONTROLS ]

Dpad - Move

A - Jump

B - Grab Egg / Throw Egg

Hold B - Aim Throw

Hold Up - Call Egg

Down + Throw - Bounce on Egg

Select - Restart

Start - Pause

[ OTHER ]

F1 - Resize Window

Esc - Quit Game
